contentformat.desc: The format used for the content

inlineattachmentsid.desc: The draft file area id for inline attachments in the content

attachmentsid.desc: The draft file area id for attachments

status.desc: True if the submission was created false otherwise.

functions.name: mod_workshop_evaluate_assessment

weight.desc: The new weight for the assessment.

status.desc: status: true if the assessment was evaluated, false otherwise.

message.desc: untranslated english message to explain the warning

functions.description: Evaluates an assessment (used by teachers for provide feedback to the reviewer).

functions.name: mod_workshop_evaluate_submission

status.desc: status: true if the submission was evaluated, false otherwise.

warningcode.desc: the warning code can be used by the client app to implement specific behaviour

message.desc: untranslated english message to explain the warning

functions.description: Evaluates a submission (used by teachers for provide feedback or override the submission grade).

id.desc: The primary key of the record.

submissionid.desc: The id of the assessed submission

reviewerid.desc: The id of the reviewer who makes this assessment

weight.desc: The weight of the assessment for the purposes of aggregation

timecreated.desc:
If 0 then the assessment was allocated but the reviewer has not assessed yet.
                    If greater than 0 then the timestamp of when the reviewer assessed for the first time

timemodified.desc:
If 0 then the assessment was allocated but the reviewer has not assessed yet.
                    If greater than 0 then the timestamp of when the reviewer assessed for the last time

grade.desc:
The aggregated grade for submission suggested by the reviewer.
                    The grade 0..100 is computed from the values assigned to the assessment dimensions fields. If NULL then it has not been aggregated yet.

gradinggrade.desc: The computed grade 0..100 for this assessment. If NULL then it has not been computed yet.

gradinggradeover.desc:
Grade for the assessment manually overridden by a teacher.
                    Grade is always from interval 0..100. If NULL then the grade is not overriden.

gradinggradeoverby.desc: The id of the user who has overridden the grade for submission.

feedbackauthor.desc: The comment/feedback from the reviewer for the author.

feedbackauthorformat.desc: feedbackauthor format (1 = HTML, 0 = MOODLE, 2 = PLAIN, or 4 = MARKDOWN)

feedbackauthorattachment.desc:
Are there some files attached to the feedbackauthor field?
                    Sets to 1 by file_postupdate_standard_filemanager().

feedbackreviewer.desc:
The comment/feedback from the teacher for the reviewer.
                    For example the reason why the grade for assessment was overridden

feedbackreviewerformat.desc: feedbackreviewer format (1 = HTML, 0 = MOODLE, 2 = PLAIN, or 4 = MARKDOWN)

repositorytype.desc: The repository type for the external files.
The repository type for the external files.

warningcode.desc: the warning code can be used by the client app to implement specific behaviour

message.desc: untranslated english message to explain the warning

dimenssionscount.desc: The number of dimenssions used by the form.

repositorytype.desc: The repository type for external files.

warningcode.desc: the warning code can be used by the client app to implement specific behaviour

message.desc: untranslated english message to explain the warning

userid.desc: User id (empty or 0 for current user).

assessmentgradehidden.desc: Whether the grade is hidden or not.

submissiongradehidden.desc: Whether the grade is hidden or not.

warningcode.desc: the warning code can be used by the client app to implement specific behaviour

message.desc: untranslated english message to explain the warning

functions.description: Returns the assessment and submission grade for the given user.

groupid.desc: Group id, 0 means that the function will determine the user group.

sortby.desc:
sort by this element: lastname, firstname, submissiontitle,
                    submissionmodified, submissiongrade, gradinggrade.

page.desc: The page of records to return.

perpage.desc: The number of records to return per page.

userid.desc: The id of the user being displayed in the report.

submissiongradeover.desc:
Grade for the assessment overrided
                                        by the teacher.

submissiongradeoverby.desc:
The id of the user who overrided
                                        the grade.

reviewedby.desc:
The users who reviewed the
                                        user submission.

userid.desc: The id of the user (0 when is configured to do not display names).

submissionid.desc: The id of the submission assessed.

weight.desc: The weight of the assessment for aggregation.

submissionid.desc: The id of the submission assessed.

functions.name: mod_workshop_get_reviewer_assessments

userid.desc: User id who did the assessment review (empty or 0 for current user).

id.desc: The primary key of the record.

submissionid.desc: The id of the assessed submission

reviewerid.desc: The id of the reviewer who makes this assessment

weight.desc: The weight of the assessment for the purposes of aggregation

timecreated.desc:
If 0 then the assessment was allocated but the reviewer has not assessed yet.
                    If greater than 0 then the timestamp of when the reviewer assessed for the first time

timemodified.desc:
If 0 then the assessment was allocated but the reviewer has not assessed yet.
                    If greater than 0 then the timestamp of when the reviewer assessed for the last time

grade.desc:
The aggregated grade for submission suggested by the reviewer.
                    The grade 0..100 is computed from the values assigned to the assessment dimensions fields. If NULL then it has not been aggregated yet.

gradinggrade.desc: The computed grade 0..100 for this assessment. If NULL then it has not been computed yet.

gradinggradeover.desc:
Grade for the assessment manually overridden by a teacher.
                    Grade is always from interval 0..100. If NULL then the grade is not overriden.

gradinggradeoverby.desc: The id of the user who has overridden the grade for submission.

feedbackauthor.desc: The comment/feedback from the reviewer for the author.

feedbackauthorformat.desc: feedbackauthor format (1 = HTML, 0 = MOODLE, 2 = PLAIN, or 4 = MARKDOWN)

feedbackauthorattachment.desc:
Are there some files attached to the feedbackauthor field?
                    Sets to 1 by file_postupdate_standard_filemanager().

feedbackreviewer.desc:
The comment/feedback from the teacher for the reviewer.
                    For example the reason why the grade for assessment was overridden

functions.description: Retrieves all the assessments reviewed by the given user.

id.desc: The primary key of the record.

workshopid.desc: The id of the workshop instance.

example.desc: Is this submission an example from teacher.

timecreated.desc: Timestamp when the work was submitted for the first time.

timemodified.desc: Timestamp when the submission has been updated.

contentformat.desc: content format (1 = HTML, 0 = MOODLE, 2 = PLAIN, or 4 = MARKDOWN)

contenttrust.desc: The trust mode of the data.

grade.desc:
Aggregated grade for the submission. The grade is a decimal number from interval 0..100.
                    If NULL then the grade for submission has not been aggregated yet.

gradeover.desc:
Grade for the submission manually overridden by a teacher. Grade is always from interval 0..100.
                    If NULL then the grade is not overriden.

gradeoverby.desc: The id of the user who has overridden the grade for submission.

feedbackauthor.desc:
Teacher comment/feedback for the author of the submission, for example describing the reasons
                    for the grade overriding.

feedbackauthorformat.desc: feedbackauthor format (1 = HTML, 0 = MOODLE, 2 = PLAIN, or 4 = MARKDOWN)

timegraded.desc: The timestamp when grade or gradeover was recently modified.

published.desc: Shall the submission be available to other when the workshop is closed.

late.desc: Has this submission been submitted after the deadline or during the assessment phase?

repositorytype.desc: The repository type for the external files.
The repository type for the external files.

warningcode.desc: the warning code can be used by the client app to implement specific behaviour

message.desc: untranslated english message to explain the warning

Grade for the submission manually overridden by a teacher. Grade is always from interval 0..100.

creatingsubmissionallowed.desc: Is the given user allowed to create their submission?

modifyingsubmissionallowed.desc: Is the user allowed to modify his existing submission?

assessingallowed.desc: Is the user allowed to create/edit his assessments?

assessingexamplesallowed.desc: Are reviewers allowed to create/edit their assessments of the example submissions?.

examplesassessedbeforesubmission.desc:
Whether the given user has assessed all his required examples before submission
                (always true if there are not examples to assess or not configured to check before submission).

examplesassessedbeforeassessment.desc:
Whether the given user has assessed all his required examples before assessment
                (always true if there are not examples to assessor not configured to check before assessment).

message.desc: untranslated english message to explain the warning

canview.desc: Whether the user has the capability mod/workshop:view allowed.

canaddinstance.desc: Whether the user has the capability mod/workshop:addinstance allowed.

canswitchphase.desc: Whether the user has the capability mod/workshop:switchphase allowed.

caneditdimensions.desc: Whether the user has the capability mod/workshop:editdimensions allowed.

cansubmit.desc: Whether the user has the capability mod/workshop:submit allowed.

canpeerassess.desc: Whether the user has the capability mod/workshop:peerassess allowed.

canmanageexamples.desc: Whether the user has the capability mod/workshop:manageexamples allowed.

canallocate.desc: Whether the user has the capability mod/workshop:allocate allowed.

canpublishsubmissions.desc: Whether the user has the capability mod/workshop:publishsubmissions allowed.

canviewauthornames.desc: Whether the user has the capability mod/workshop:viewauthornames allowed.

canviewreviewernames.desc: Whether the user has the capability mod/workshop:viewreviewernames allowed.

canviewallsubmissions.desc: Whether the user has the capability mod/workshop:viewallsubmissions allowed.

canviewpublishedsubmissions.desc: Whether the user has the capability mod/workshop:viewpublishedsubmissions allowed.

canviewauthorpublished.desc: Whether the user has the capability mod/workshop:viewauthorpublished allowed.

canviewallassessments.desc: Whether the user has the capability mod/workshop:viewallassessments allowed.

canoverridegrades.desc: Whether the user has the capability mod/workshop:overridegrades allowed.

canignoredeadlines.desc: Whether the user has the capability mod/workshop:ignoredeadlines allowed.

candeletesubmissions.desc: Whether the user has the capability mod/workshop:deletesubmissions allowed.

canexportsubmissions.desc: Whether the user has the capability mod/workshop:exportsubmissions allowed.

functions.description: Return access information for a given workshop.

functions.name: mod_workshop_get_workshops_by_courses

id.desc: The primary key of the record.

course.desc: Course id this workshop is part of.

introformat.desc: intro format (1 = HTML, 0 = MOODLE, 2 = PLAIN, or 4 = MARKDOWN)

instructauthorsformat.desc: instructauthors format (1 = HTML, 0 = MOODLE, 2 = PLAIN, or 4 = MARKDOWN)

instructreviewersformat.desc: instructreviewers format (1 = HTML, 0 = MOODLE, 2 = PLAIN, or 4 = MARKDOWN)

timemodified.desc: The timestamp when the module was modified.

phase.desc: The current phase of workshop (0 = not available, 1 = submission, 2 = assessment, 3 = closed).

useexamples.desc: Optional feature: students practise evaluating on example submissions from teacher.

usepeerassessment.desc: Optional feature: students perform peer assessment of others' work.

useselfassessment.desc: Optional feature: students perform self assessment of their own work.

strategy.desc: The type of the current grading strategy used in this workshop.

evaluation.desc: The recently used grading evaluation method.

gradedecimals.desc: Number of digits that should be shown after the decimal point when displaying grades.

submissiontypetext.desc: Indicates whether text is required as part of each submission. 0 for no, 1 for optional, 2 for required.

submissiontypefile.desc: Indicates whether a file upload is required as part of each submission. 0 for no, 1 for optional, 2 for required.

submissionfiletypes.desc: Comma separated list of file extensions.

latesubmissions.desc: Allow submitting the work after the deadline.

maxbytes.desc: Maximum size of the one attached file.

examplesmode.desc:
0 = example assessments are voluntary, 1 = examples must be assessed before submission,
                    2 = examples are available after own submission and must be assessed before peer/self assessment phase.

submissionstart.desc: 0 = will be started manually, greater than 0 the timestamp of the start of the submission phase.

submissionend.desc: 0 = will be closed manually, greater than 0 the timestamp of the end of the submission phase.

assessmentstart.desc: 0 = will be started manually, greater than 0 the timestamp of the start of the assessment phase.

assessmentend.desc: 0 = will be closed manually, greater than 0 the timestamp of the end of the assessment phase.

phaseswitchassessment.desc: Automatically switch to the assessment phase after the submissions deadline.

conclusion.desc: A text to be displayed at the end of the workshop.

conclusionformat.desc: conclusion format (1 = HTML, 0 = MOODLE, 2 = PLAIN, or 4 = MARKDOWN)

overallfeedbackmode.desc: Mode of the overall feedback support.

overallfeedbackfiles.desc: Number of allowed attachments to the overall feedback.

overallfeedbackfiletypes.desc: Comma separated list of file extensions.

overallfeedbackmaxbytes.desc: Maximum size of one file attached to the overall feedback.

repositorytype.desc: The repository type for the external files.
The repository type for the external files.
The repository type for the external files.
The repository type for the external files.

warningcode.desc: the warning code can be used by the client app to implement specific behaviour

message.desc: untranslated english message to explain the warning

Returns a list of workshops in a provided list of courses, if no list is provided all workshops that
                            the user can view will be returned.

functions.name: mod_workshop_update_assessment

name.desc:
The assessment data (use WS get_assessment_form_definition for obtaining the data to sent).
                                Apart from that data, you can optionally send:
                                feedbackauthor (str); the feedback for the submission author
                                feedbackauthorformat (int); the format of the feedbackauthor
                                feedbackauthorinlineattachmentsid (int); the draft file area for the editor attachments
                                feedbackauthorattachmentsid (int); the draft file area id for the feedback attachments

status.desc: status: true if the assessment was added or updated false otherwise.

rawgrade.desc: Raw percentual grade (0.00000 to 100.00000) for submission.

message.desc: untranslated english message to explain the warning
